dto.EditableSubscriptionPayerModel.description: Subscription payer object used for updating who pays for a subscription

memberId.description: @Description LabelID of the specific family member who pays (required when type is family_member)

type.description: @Description Type of payer (family or family member)

family_member_id.description: LabelID of the family member accepting the invitation
LabelID of the family member accepting the invitation
LabelID of the family member to be invited

type.description: Type of the member (adult or kid)

dto.FamilyMemberModel.description: Family member object containing member information

created_at.description: @Description Timestamp when the member was created

etag.description: @Description Entity tag for optimistic concurrency control

family_id.description: @Description LabelID of the family this member belongs to

has_account.description: @Description Indicates whether this member has an account with the service provider

id.description: @Description Unique identifier for the family member

is_you.description: @Description Indicates whether this member is the current authenticated user

type.description: @Description Whether this member is a child (affects permissions and features)

updated_at.description: @Description Timestamp when the member was last updated

created_at.description: @Description ISO 8601 timestamp indicating when the family was originally created

etag.description: @Description Entity tag used for optimistic concurrency control to prevent conflicting updates

id.description: @Description Unique identifier for the family (UUID format)

is_owner.description: @Description Indicates whether the current authenticated user is the owner of this family

members.description: @Description Complete list of all members belonging to this family

updated_at.description: @Description ISO 8601 timestamp indicating when the family information was last modified

color.description: @Description Hexadecimal color code for visual representation of the label

created_at.description: @Description ISO 8601 timestamp indicating when the label was originally created

etag.description: @Description Entity tag used for optimistic concurrency control to prevent conflicting updates

id.description: @Description Unique identifier for the label (UUID format)

updated_at.description: @Description ISO 8601 timestamp indicating when the label was last modified

dto.OwnerModel.description: @Description Ownership information specifying whether this subscription belongs to a user or family

etag.description: @Description Entity tag for optimistic concurrency control

family_id.description: @Description Family LabelID when an ownership type is family (required for family ownership)

type.description: @Description Type of ownership (personal, family or system)

userId.description: @Description UserProfile LabelID when an ownership type is personal (required for personal ownership)

data.description: Data contains the list of items for the current page

length.description: Length represents the number of items in the current page

total.description: Total represents the total number of items available

length.description: Length represents the number of items in the current page

total.description: Total represents the total number of items available

length.description: Length represents the number of items in the current page

total.description: Total represents the total number of items available

dto.ProviderModel.description: Provider object containing information about a subscription service provider and their available plans

created_at.description: @Description ISO 8601 timestamp when the provider was originally created

description.description: @Description Optional detailed description of the provider and their services
description.example: Streaming service offering movies and TV shows

etag.description: @Description Entity tag used for optimistic concurrency control to prevent conflicting updates

icon_url.description: @Description Optional URL to the provider's icon or logo image

id.description: @Description Unique identifier for the provider (UUID format)

labels.description: @Description List of label IDs associated with this provider for categorization

name.description: @Description Display name of the service provider

pricing_page_url.description: @Description Optional URL to the provider's pricing information page

updated_at.description: @Description ISO 8601 timestamp when the provider was last modified

url.description: @Description Optional URL to the provider's main website

dto.SubscriptionFreeTrialModel.description: @Description Number of free trial days remaining (null if no trial or trial expired)

dto.SubscriptionModel.description: Subscription object containing all information about an active subscription including billing and usage details

created_at.description: @Description ISO 8601 timestamp when the subscription was originally created

custom_recurrency.description: @Description CustomRecurrency recurrency interval in days (required when recurrency is custom)

end_date.description: @Description ISO 8601 timestamp when the subscription expires (null for ongoing subscriptions)

etag.description: @Description Entity tag used for optimistic concurrency control to prevent conflicting updates

family_users.description: @Description List of family member IDs who use this service (for shared subscriptions)

friendly_name.description: @Description Optional custom name for easy identification of the subscription

id.description: @Description Unique identifier for the subscription (UUID format)

label_refs.description: @Description List of labels associated with this subscription

provider_id.description: @Description LabelID of the service provider offering this subscription

recurrency.description: @Description Billing recurrency pattern (monthly, yearly, custom, etc.)

start_date.description: @Description ISO 8601 timestamp when the subscription becomes active

status.description: @Description Indicates the current status of the subscription

updated_at.description: @Description ISO 8601 timestamp when the subscription was last modified

dto.SubscriptionPayerModel.description: @Description Information about who pays for this subscription within the family

etag.description: @Description Entity tag used for optimistic concurrency control to prevent conflicting updates

memberId.description: @Description LabelID of the specific family member who pays (required when type is family_member)

type.description: @Description Type of payer (family or family member)

info.description: This api provide HTTPRest endpoints for the application SubTracker.
info.title: SubTracker API

get.description: Returns the preferred currency for the authenticated account

put.description: Updates the preferred currency for the authenticated account

get.description: Retrieve the current quota usage and limits for the authenticated user
Get exchange rates for all currencies at a specific date

parameters.description: Conversion date in RFC3339 format (default: current time)
parameters.name: date

get.description: get details of all supported currencies
Retrieve the user's family

post.description: Create a new family with the authenticated user as the owner and initial member

get.description: Retrieve the current quota usage and limits for the authenticated user

delete.description: Permanently delete a family and all its members

400.description: Bad Request - Invalid family LabelID format

put.description: Update family information such as name and other details

400.description: Bad Request - Invalid input data or family LabelID

post.description: Accepts an invitation to join a family using the provided invitation code
Endpoint to decline an invitation to join a family

get.description: Get information about a family invitation using invitation code

post.description: Creates an invitation for a new member to join the family

requestBody.description: Invitation details including email, name, member LabelID and type (adult/kid)

200.description: Successfully created invitation with code and IDs

post.summary: Invite a new member to the family

post.description: Add a new member to an existing family

400.description: Bad Request - Invalid input data or family LabelID

delete.description: Permanently delete a family member from a family

204.description: No Content - Family member successfully deleted

404.description: Family or family member not found

put.description: Update an existing family member's information such as name and kid status

400.description: Bad Request - Invalid input data or LabelID format

404.description: Family or family member not found

post.description: Revokes a member from the family

get.description: Returns the health status of the application
Retrieve a paginated list of labels with optional filtering by owner type and search text

parameters.description: Search text to filter labels by name
parameters.name: search

parameters.description: Maximum number of items to return (default: 10)
parameters.name: limit

parameters.description: Number of items to skip for pagination (default: 0)
parameters.name: offset

post.description: Create a new label with specified name, color, and owner information

get.description: Export all labels in CSV, JSON, or YAML format
Retrieve the current quota usage and limits for the authenticated user

delete.description: Permanently delete a label by its unique identifier

get.description: Retrieve a single label by its unique identifier

put.description: Update an existing label's name and color by its unique identifier

400.description: Bad Request - Invalid LabelID format or input data

get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of all providers with their plans and prices

post.description: Create a new service provider with labels and owner information

get.description: Export all providers in CSV, JSON, or YAML format
Retrieve the current quota usage and limits for the authenticated user

delete.description: Permanently delete a provider and all its associated plans and prices

400.description: Bad Request - Invalid provider LabelID format

get.description: Retrieve a single provider with all its plans and prices by LabelID

parameters.description: Provider ID (UUID format) or Provider Key (string format)
parameters.name: providerId

400.description: Bad Request - Invalid provider LabelID format

put.description: Update an existing provider's basic information

400.description: Bad Request - Invalid input data or provider LabelID

get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of all subscriptions for the authenticated user

post.description: Create a new subscription with provider, plan, pricing, and payment information

get.description: Export all subscriptions in CSV, JSON, or YAML format
Retrieve the current quota usage and limits for the authenticated user
Returns summary information about subscriptions including total costs and upcoming renewals

parameters.description: Number of top providers to return
parameters.name: top_providers

parameters.description: Number of top labels to return
parameters.name: top_labels

parameters.description: Number of upcoming renewals to return
parameters.name: upcoming_renewals

400.description: Bad Request - Invalid subscription LabelID format

get.description: Retrieve a single subscription with all its details including provider, plan, and pricing information

400.description: Bad Request - Invalid subscription LabelID format

put.description: Update an existing subscription's details including provider, plan, pricing, and payment information

400.description: Bad Request - Invalid input data or subscription LabelID

get.description: Returns the build version of the SubTracker API
